name: Brandon's Better Conan: Siege Damage Adjuster
description:
BETA-0.9.5
Please send all feedback to me on steam at The 7th Crest, or on Discord at The 7th Crest#9918.
Check out the Mod Discord: https://discord.gg/bzx3nGpz

This mod is intended to give server owners granular control over the damage done by siege weapons such as Jars, Trebuchets, Orbs, and Special Ammunition.

This mod
changeNote:
-Changed BBCBaseFireDamage from 50 to 100 to account for Funcom's increase of demon-fire orb base damage from 500 damage to 1000
-Changerd BBC_BP_Orb_Effect_GroundFire to scale with the new Demonfire Orb Adjustment made by Funcom in 3.0
-Changed BBC_BP_OrbEffect_Combo_LargeFire to similary scale to adjustments made by Funcoim
-Rebuild for CE3.0
author: Brandon Snider (a.k.a. The 7th Crest)
